Note 1:

The above data was scanned into ASCII text files for presentation

in this home page. Please be advised to keep a careful lookout for

misspellings initiated by the scanning and OCR processes. If you are

suspicious of a surname spelling or a date it would be wise to request

a copy of the original source document. The official performing the

ceremony is listed as "Minister" although he may be a civil official.

When the Minister ID number is listed as (NR) it indicates that a

license was issued but there is no record of marriage being performed.

Note 2:

Subject: Hood County Marriages "B" Brides-Correction

Date: Mon, 14 Dec 1998 22:12:54 -0700

From: Mary Jane Pattillo <marpat@ctaz.com>

To: granbury@hcnews.com

Hi:

I have a correction for you:

The entry:

WOOD, M. A. Bullia (?) Jennie 14Oct.1889 C/228 (344)

Sould be:

WOOD, Melvin Abija Bascum "Bud" BULLION, Mary Virginia "Jennie"

Jennie Bullion Wood is my husband's great aunt.

Thanks for all the great information and web page.

I really appreciate all the help and records available.
